email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a 100,000 MT cargo. The vessel has a DWT of 120,000 and an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per MT. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. We were hoping for something in the mid to high 40s. Can you check if there’s any flexibility? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer a revised rate of $49.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. $49.50 per MT is acceptable. However, we’d like to negotiate the demurrage rate down to $12,000 per day. Can you check with the owner? Also, can we confirm the laycan as 15-20 October? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, good news—the owner has agreed to a demurrage rate of $12,000 per day. The laycan remains 15-20 October. Shall we proceed with the fixture? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds great. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks for your help on this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached. To summarize: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, Cargo: 100,000 MT Crude Oil, Load Port: Rotterdam, Discharge Port: Singapore, Freight Rate: $49.50 per MT, Demurrage: $12,000 per day, Laycan: 15-20 October. Let me know if everything looks good. Best, Sarah
